description:
Irie moves the blocks in Merone once again and fatefully reunites Gokudera and Gamma. Gokudera remembers his terrible loss to Gamma. Meanwhile, Gamma realizes how Merone Base works and tells Gokudera and Ryohei about it. Gamma looks confident, but his distrust of Irie has grown and he is deeply resentful. He says that he is thankful for this battle and glares at them. Gokudera immediately jumps out, but he`s held back by rope strengthened by Ryohei`s Sun flames. Ryohei tells Gokudera that he`s going to fight, and begins to walk towards Gamma--!
Source: crunchyroll
